task.title: Add Memory
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to add a new Translation Memory to RemoteTM.

step.cmd: Login as a user with "System Administrator" or "Project Manager" privileges.
Click the Add Memory button on the main toolbar.
step.stepresult: The Add Memory dialog appears: Add Memory Dialog

step.cmd: Type a name for the new memory in the Memory Name text box.
step.info: Only Latin characters, numbers and underscores should be used in a memory name.

step.cmd: Optionally, type a project description in the Project text input.
Optionally, type a subject for the TM data in the Subject text input.
Optionally, enter a client name in the Client text box.

taskbody.result: A translation memory is created with full access granted to the owner.
